DOC.brief_summary: EMERGENCY CANCER PAIN MANAGEMENT HAS BEEN INCONSISTENT AND INADEQUATE ACROSS THE GLOBE . THIS STUDY AIMS TO KNOW EMERGENCY ROOM CANCER PAIN PATTERNS AND TREATMENT ADEQUACY IN TERTIARY CARE CANCER HOSPITALS .
DOC.brief_title: A Observational Study Assessment Treatment Adequacy Emergency Cancer Pain Tertiary Cancer Hospital
DOC.criteria: ADULT CANCER PATIENTS REPORTING TO EMERGENCY ROOM WITH COMPLAINTS PRIMARILY OF PAIN PATIENTS BELOW 18 YEARS OF AGE AND PATIENTS WITH INCOHERENT BEHAVIOUR .
